outline:
1. to esteem, be prized, be valuable, be precious, be costly, be appraised
    1. (Qal)
      1. to be precious, be highly valued, be esteemed, be costly
      2. to be appraised
    2. (Hiphil) to make something precious
kjv_def: be (make) precious, be prized, be set by, withdraw.
strongs_def: properly, apparently, to be heavy, i.e. (figuratively) valuable; causatively, to make rare (figuratively, to inhibit)
